thread.title: Free three-month trial of Amazon Cloud Drive
thread.title_full: Free three-month trial of Amazon Cloud Drive

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Free three-month trial of Amazon Cloud Drive
text:
Free unlimited photo stores with three month trial of Amazon Cloud Drive. 
Get a free three-month trial on Amazon Cloud Drive. 
Choose from two plans. 
The first offer is for unlimited photo storage and 5 GB of video storage for $11.99 a year. 
Or, if you need more space, try Amazonâ€™s unlimited plan for free for three months. It will house all your photos, videos and documents for $59.99 per year. 
Both are great offers considering Apple recently cut cloud prices to 99 cents for 50 GB of space, $2.99 for 200 GB and $9.99 for 1 TB per month.
